chunkedData:
Marketed as "US brand, made in China";  for the price point, the effectiveness of the product, and the fragrance makes it a very good contender for a toilet spray.  

Only issue is the sprayer mechanism.  

Just doesnt work - more often that not, it dribbles a couple of drops than create a spray.  

Used a old bottle from a different brand which had a much more effective spray.  

Seems to work with that.  

The eucalyptus notes are dominant and pleasant.
reviewText: Marketed as "US brand, made in China";  for the price point, the effectiveness of the product, and the fragrance makes it a very good contender for a toilet spray.  Only issue is the sprayer mechanism.  Just doesnt work - more often that not, it dribbles a couple of drops than create a spray.  Used a old bottle from a different brand which had a much more effective spray.  Seems to work with that.  The eucalyptus notes are dominant and pleasant.
reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars, good fragrance, effective, poor sprayer mechanism

chunkedData:
"Im thoroughly impressed with the Clean-n-Fresh Toilet Spray.

Not only does it come in a convenient 6.8 fl. oz size bottle, but the fact that it promises up to 400+ uses is truly amazing.

The scent is pleasant without being overwhelming, doing a great job of neutralizing odors.

It has definitely brought a new level of freshness to my bathroom.

I would highly recommend this product to anyone!"
reviewText: "Im thoroughly impressed with the Clean-n-Fresh Toilet Spray. Not only does it come in a convenient 6.8 fl. oz size bottle, but the fact that it promises up to 400+ uses is truly amazing. The scent is pleasant without being overwhelming, doing a great job of neutralizing odors. It has definitely brought a new level of freshness to my bathroom. I would highly recommend this product to anyone!"
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars, It has definitely brought a new level of freshness to my bathroom!

chunkedData:
"I bought this for a cruise with my fiance.  

Knowing that the rooms are very small, and mother nature calls from both people.....

I knew we would need something.  

Great choice.  

Smell is great, takes poo smell away immediately.  

It was kind of expensive, but I had to try something.

Glad I bought this for sure!"
reviewText: "I bought this for a cruise with my fiance.  Knowing that the rooms are very small, and mother nature calls from both people.....I knew we would need something.  Great choice.  Smell is great, takes poo smell away immediately.  It was kind of expensive, but I had to try something. Glad I bought this for sure!"

chunkedData:
"I bought this as a substitute for PooPourri.

Its cheaper, and gets decent reviews, so I decided to try it.

Its DEFINITELY NOT LIKE POOPOURRI.

The scent is very weak, unlike PooPourri- when you spray PooPourri in the toilet the scent stays in the bathroom for a long period of time.

I like to use these after using the restroom, too.

It makes you bathroom smell nice.

This one does not do that.

The scent is barely noticeable.
reviewText: "I bought this as a substitute for PooPourri. Its cheaper, and gets decent reviews, so I decided to try it. Its DEFINITELY NOT LIKE POOPOURRI. The scent is very weak, unlike PooPourri- when you spray PooPourri in the toilet the scent stays in the bathroom for a long period of time. I like to use these after using the restroom, too. It makes you bathroom smell nice. This one does not do that. The scent is barely noticeable.", "Yes, its cheaper, but you have to use quadruple the number of sprays for less than a quarter of the scent. I dont recommend this."

chunkedData:
It‚Äôs not bad, just not exactly what I was expecting for something labeled as vanilla.

The bottles are a decent size, but the sprayers are kind of finicky.

This spray also has a tendency to billow in the air, up onto the toilet seat and onto the backside of whoever is on the toilet seat.

Leaving an oily residue behind.

Not really a fan of that, as I have very sensitive skin and a sensitive vaginal pH.

So I resorted to spraying this spray in the toilet right after a BM.
reviewText: I ordered this toilet spray in the ‚ÄúVanilla‚Äù scent and the combination of vanilla oil, lemon oil, and lavender oil smells like a generic artificial tropical scent that is commonly used in public bathrooms. Kind of fake smelling with just a hint of janitorial cleaner mixed in. It‚Äôs not bad, just not exactly what I was expecting for something labeled as vanilla. The bottles are a decent size, but the sprayers are kind of finicky. This spray also has a tendency to billow in the air, up onto the toilet seat and onto the backside of whoever is on the toilet seat. Leaving an oily residue behind. Not really a fan of that, as I have very sensitive skin and a sensitive vaginal pH. So I resorted to spraying this spray in the toilet right after a BM. It actually works great that way. It stops the smells immediately and leaves behind a very pleasant scent in my bathroom.
reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars, Public bathroom artificial tropical scent.
